user.title: Set up Media Index
user.description:
Configure media folder scanning and indexing.

Base folder must be an actual filesystem path, NOT a media-source:// URI. Use the actual path that media_source maps to (e.g., /media, /config/www/local).

Media source URI is optional and only needed for custom media path mappings (copy from Home Assistant Media Card path config). Leave empty for standard /media base_folder paths)

data.base_folder: Base media folder (filesystem path: /media, /config/www, NOT media-source://)
data.media_source_uri: Optional Media Source URI (e.g., media-source://media_source/local/ when using /config/www as base folder)
data.auto_install_libmediainfo: Auto-install libmediainfo for video metadata extraction (integration auto-reloads after install - no restart needed). If you have multiple Media Index instances, only enable this for one of the instances.

error.folder_not_found: Folder not found. Please check the path and try again.

abort.already_configured: Media Index is already configured for this folder.

data.media_source_uri: Media source URI (optional, only needed for custom media_dirs mappings)
data.geocode_native_language: Use native language names (e.g., 日本 instead of Japan)
data.auto_install_libmediainfo: Auto-install libmediainfo (for video metadata extraction). Only enable for one instance if multiple Media Index instances are used.
